message.body: Hey it's Christina. I got work tomorrow night until 11:/ how late do trains run?
Damn girl they got u makin burritos all damn night!! Melissa was sayin smth bout gettina ride so mayb we can wait for u. Last train is 1230 tho
Okay well text me and let me know what's going on. If you guys get a ride and want to leave earlier ten 11 it's totally cool I don't want to make you guys wait
Nah man its all good im tryna chill!!
We might just drink back at our place if things don't work out tonight
Oh that was for your friend Dan lol
Oh opps lol that was for Melissa hahaha!
??? What did you mean to say to me?
Hahaha if things don't work out I'm getting drunk at my house and who ever wants to come can
Damn keepin it real i see
My buddy who sits next to me at work just got back from chipotle on 15th and said no Italian girls workin there. Only negroes lol
I just started there the other week haha I'm a transfer
I meant were u workin there like an hr ago
Oh no I don't start till 4
Ahhh its all makin sense now
